short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a delete button directly on videos in your playlist. Saves you a few clicks since you won't have to use the action menu again!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to unnecessary clicks and action menu navigation. This extension adds a handy "Remove video from playlist" button directly onto the videos in your YouTube playlist.

This extension is not affiliated with YouTube or Google.

---

Feature requests are always welcome!
If you need any help with this extension, feel free to contact me.

You can buy me a beer, if you feel like it:
